name: SurfScore, Inc.
description: Developer of programming curriculum software intended to make programming education accessible to children. The company's platform translates computer science into easy-to-teach lessons and games that kids love and offers scripted lesson plans, and automated assessment tools among others, enabling teachers and parents to teach computer science to tomorrow's innovators and explore the universe of coding problems, solving math, and language arts.
one_liner: Developer of programming curriculum software intended to make programming education accessible to children. The company's platform translates computer science into easy-to-teach lessons and games that kids love and offers scripted lesson plans, and automated assessment tools among others, enabling teachers and parents to teach computer science to tomorrow's innovators and explore the universe of coding problems, solving math, and language arts.
